page.title: 20Hilldale Village Hall
page.content: The single storey building stands by the main road from Hilldale to Bispham. On the board outside it reads : WRIGHTINGTON PARISH COUNCIL HILLDALE VILLAGE HALL AND PLAYING FIELD OPENED 1981 BY COUNCILLOR MISS S.TAYLOR J.P. CHAIRMAN WEST LANCS.DISTRICT COUNCIL There are 2 Portacabins at the side of the main hall giving 2 additional rooms.Regular activities held here are: The over-60's group,Bingo,Nursery Schl. Youth Club, Council Meetings,Parties. On 26.6.1985 there was a Strawberry Evening,a village effort for the N.S.P.C.C. In the field at the back of the hall you can play football,cricket or golf.
